imdb.title: Kyôkai senjô no Horizon
imdb.plot: The students of the Ariadust Academy must use their unique abilities to gain allies during a reenactment of the 1588 A.D. invasion of England by the Spanish Armada. Meanwhile the class must simultaneously defend the resurrected he...

episodes.title: Ake no Ba no Buin-tachi
episodes.plot: The students go to battle with foes from Tres Espana and learn the motivation behind the attack. But when they search for an ally, they discover it may do more harm than good.

episodes.title: Butai-jo no Senkoku-sha
episodes.plot: A Musashi ship crashes on English soil and a mysterious stranger offers aid. Meanwhile, the connection between Felipe and Juana becomes clear.

episodes.title: Do Jo no Kudari-mono
episodes.plot: Negotiations between the Musashi students and the English heat up as Shirojiro suggests an unusual solution. Meanwhile, Tenzo learns the identity of the cloaked stranger.

episodes.title: Gekijou no Shihaisha
episodes.plot: As the students prepare for a celebration, Tenzo and his new friend grow closer. Meanwhile, Horizon questions Tori's motives.

episodes.title: Ryouba no Jindoushugisha
episodes.plot: A series of duels pits Musashi students against their English counterparts, but there may be more to these exhibitions. Meanwhile, feelings strengthen between the two couples during the festival.

episodes.title: Hiroba no Danjou
episodes.plot: The duels continue, a skeleton army emerges, and a doppelganger leads to surprise and suspicion.

episodes.title: Hiroma no Kataribe
episodes.plot: The Musashi students play politics as they're caught between the demands of the English and the dangers of Tres Espana.

episodes.title: Gekijou no Houkousha
episodes.plot: Both Tres España and the Musashi formulate new strategies in their attempts to defeat one another. Meanwhile, two writers clash over Shakespeare.

episodes.title: Hanabatake no Goukakusha
episodes.plot: Tenzo risks everything to rescue Mary, but she's not yet sure she should be saved. Meanwhile, the Musashi students face a new round of attacks in the naval battle with Tres Espana.

episodes.title: Kyokai-sen Mae no Seiretsu-sha-tachi
episodes.plot: The students at Ariadust Academy must use speed, skill, and teamwork to outsmart their teacher during a wild chase around the city. Later, Tori Aoi, the supposedly talentless head of the student council, announces his plan to ask out his friend, Horizon, who died 10 years ago.

episodes.title: Shokujiba no Seijun-sha
episodes.plot: The students receive a history lesson, a new classmate makes a mysterious entrance, and Tori continues his quest to confess his love to the long-dead Horizon.

episodes.title: Machinaka no Yugeki-shu
episodes.plot: The students prepare for an exorcism, Kimi worries about her brother, and the story of Horizon's death becomes clearer.

episodes.title: Yaten-ka no An'yaku-sha
episodes.plot: A fierce fighter may become a new student. Meanwhile, a surprise death sparks a global battle.

episodes.title: Gekka no Sotsugyo-sha
episodes.plot: The city faces a disaster of epic proportions and an android's true significance is revealed.

episodes.title: Kokuhaku-ba no Daiben-shu
episodes.plot: Horizon is blamed for the city's destruction and is set to be executed. When the students discover that the android is actually their former classmate, they must decide if and how to rescue her.

episodes.title: Musashi no Kishi
episodes.plot: The students can't agree on whether to rescue Horizon. To settle the debate, the two factions agree to a series of battles. Will they risk starting a war to save their friend?

episodes.title: Zen'iki no Shiji-sha
episodes.plot: The argument over Horizon's fate takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Pope President Innocentius enters the fray.

episodes.title: Takane no Hana
episodes.plot: Kimi's special talents settle the debate over Horizon once and for all.

episodes.title: Sutaatorain no Rappafuki
episodes.plot: The war has begun! Attacks rage on land and in the sky. Will the students' array of weapons be enough for the fight?

episodes.title: Musashi no Fukano Otoko
episodes.plot: The Testament Union is gaining ground, but Tori has a plan. Meanwhile, Futayo faces off against an enemy in the forest.

episodes.title: Heikoksen-jo eno Aitai-sha
episodes.plot: Tori locates Horizon and confesses his love. The only way to save both of their lives is to convince Horizon she is human. Is their bond strong enough to survive?

episodes.title: Kyokaisen-jo no Seiretsu-sha-tachi
episodes.plot: Innocentius renews his attacks on the Ariadust students. Horizon reaches a critical turning point, and new dangers approach.
